entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by Minister Scrimgeour.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: The Minister of Magic, who is trying to persuade Harry that his identity as the Chosen One matters less than what people believe.

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: A powerful and evil wizard, referred to by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: chrisitan community at large
entities.description: The collective group of wizards and witches who believe in Harry as the Chosen One.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour is trying to persuade Harry that his identity as the Chosen One matters less than what people believe.
The Christian community at large believes in Harry as the Chosen One.
